summary: A mighty sword made out of pure cheese, just for fun
descriptionHtml:
\"This is Nacho ordinary blade! You must be quite Limburger to swing it around in the Jarl\'s Burg. I Swiss I could Kraft a sword like that. It looks so Gouda! My teeth Cheddar at the thought of Shredding Munsters with it, and then retiring to my Cottage with a Queso mead. I Camembert it anymore- I﻿ need to download this! \" - Omny, Nexususer

I just created it and put in the game, you can craft at the forge in the hide section with eidar cheese, no perks needed.

-Weight: 1, hey its only cheese
-Value: 666000, funny number xD
-Damage: 50
-High chance of staggering the enemy
-Now fixed issue where it was a two-hand weapon but strangely hold only in the right hand
-People will flee the stink of the cheese.

Crafting-Recipe:
-1 Eidar Cheese Wedge
-5 Bowls of Mammoth Cheese

You can improve it at the COOKING POT with 1 Eidar Cheese Wedge

Future updates if I have the time:
-better textures
-Full Cheese Armor and weapon set
-and stuff
author: Blablakaka
